function.name: cookingTemperature_setValue
function.description: This function is used to set the temperature of a specific compartment in a cooking appliance.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the temperature.

predefinedCompartment.description: The specific compartment within the device to set the temperature.

cookingTemperature.description: The temperature value to set for the cooking device.
